The almost 4600 sf of living space features 5 bdrms, 6 bathrooms, a stunning gourmet kit, a wet bar & entertainment centre on the lower level. The finishing in the mstr ensuite is breathtaking w/ a balcony, built-in F/P & luxurious spa tub. Beautifully landscaped yard & a 4 car garage. Vancouver's best public & private schools nearby.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate, Buyers need to verify if important. By appointment only. Open House: Sat & Sun, May 9th & 10th, 2-4pm.

Public Remarks: Stunning, North of 4th, Point Grey view property! This 3 bed/2 bath 1940's beach house sits on a prime 65.76 X 110 corner lot with beautiful views of the North Shore mountains, the city and overlooking the lush greenery of Belmont Park; maximize views even further by building upward to catch the expansive ocean views. Minutes to the trendy restaurants and shops on W.10th Ave, top tier schools including Queen Mary Elementary, OLPH, Lord Byng, West Point Grey Academy and UBC and just steps to Spanish Banks and Jericho Beach. The possibilities are endless w/ this rare property in such a spectacular location!Note: Please do not walk on the subject property without an appt.

Public Remarks: Welcome to the market. An exclusive & large 80ftx172.5ft property privately located in UBC's most prestigious neighborhood. This elegant home boasts 4210 SF with a large detached garage - ideal to live in, hold or build your dream home. Situated on Western Parkway, outside the front door looks onto it's own boulevard park showcasing a gateway view of the mountains. A short walk to Pacific Spirit Park, UBC Village shops, golf course, beaches, UBC recreation facilities, Chan Centre for Performing Arts & Botanical Gardens. Minutes away from St Georges, West Point Grey Academy, Crofton House Schools. School catchment is UHill Elementary & Secondary. Benefit from the lifestyle only this property & community have to offer.

Public Remarks: One of a kind VIEW home with over 5,500 square feet, rebuilt in 2007 by Townline Homes. This house was stripped to the studs/drywall and rebuilt into a new home with contemporary finishing's while restoring and updating the historic unreplaceable bones of the house. Incredible VIEWS from the deck which can not be replicated under current bylaws. Terrific layout for entertaining and family living. Top of the line Snarido Italian gourmet kitchen. Many extra features include: Control4 entertainment system, automatic blind system, security system, radiant heat, A/C, built-in back-up generator for power outages and much more. This 66' x 168' foot view property is fully landscaped and includes heated garages, which park 5 cars.
Realtor Remarks: School Catchment: Queen Mary Elementary and Lord Byng Secondary.
